verses.verse: And the word <WH1697> of the YY <WH3068> came unto me, saying <WH559> <WH8800>,
Son <WH1121> of man <WH120>, What is the vine <WH1612> tree <WH6086> more than any tree <WH6086>, or than a branch <WH2156> which is among the trees <WH6086> of the forest <WH3293> ?

Shall wood <WH6086> be taken <WH3947> <WH8714> thereof to do <WH6213> <WH8800> any work <WH4399>? or will men take <WH3947> <WH8799> a pin <WH3489> of it to hang <WH8518> <WH8800> any vessel <WH3627> thereon?

Behold, it is cast <WH5414> <WH8738> into the fire <WH784> for fuel <WH402>; the fire <WH784> devoureth <WH398> <WH8804> both <WH8147> the ends <WH7098> of it, and the midst <WH8432> of it is burned <WH2787> <WH8737>. Is it meet <WH6743> <WH8799> for any work <WH4399> ?

Behold, when it was whole <WH8549>, it was meet <WH6213> <WH8735> for no work <WH4399>: how much less shall it be meet <WH6213> <WH8738> yet for any work <WH4399>, when the fire <WH784> hath devoured <WH398> <WH8804> it, and it is burned <WH2787> <WH8735> ?

Therefore thus saith <WH559> <WH8804> the YY <WH136> GOD <WH3069>; As the vine <WH1612> tree <WH6086> among the trees <WH6086> of the forest <WH3293>, which I have given <WH5414> <WH8804> to the fire <WH784> for fuel <WH402>, so will I give <WH5414> <WH8804> the inhabitants <WH3427> <WH8802> of Yerushalayim <WH3389>.

And I will set <WH5414> <WH8804> my face <WH6440> against them; they shall go out <WH3318> <WH8804> from one fire <WH784>, and another fire <WH784> shall devour <WH398> <WH8799> them; and ye shall know <WH3045> <WH8804> that I am the YY <WH3068>, when I set <WH7760> <WH8800> my face <WH6440> against them.
And I will make <WH5414> <WH8804> the land <WH776> desolate <WH8077>, because they have committed <WH4603> <WH8804> a trespass <WH4604>, saith <WH5002> <WH8803> the YY <WH136> GOD <WH3069>.
